plot outline: This evocative romantic drama traces the twists and turns in the life of an impulsive man, who always lets his emotions rule over his mind. When he falls madly in love, his life becomes filled with complexity and chaos. How will his love story unfold? What will the future hold in store for him?
title: Half Mentlu
plot: This evocative romantic drama traces the twists and turns in the life of an impulsive man, who always lets his emotions rule over his mind. When he falls madly in love, his life becomes filled with complexity and chaos. How will his love story unfold? What will the future hold in store for him?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
